about_the_game:
We are a Husband and Wife (Programmer and Artist) Indie Game Developer team, called Cinderwing Games! We have spent the last 5 years honing our skills to be able to create our first official game. We have 2 kids and 2 full time jobs, so we usually work on games after the kids go to bed, between 9pm and 2am every day! It's hard, but this is our dream to be Indie Game Developers and we will make it happen!

We greatly appreciate your support and love receiving feedback that helps us shape our games!

FUSION RELICS: A 2D side-scrolling, creature collector, RPG platformer with arcade hack and slash mechanics, hand drawn art, and character customization, where you battle giant titans, hatch unique creatures, and restore the balance between Light and Dark to a corrupted world!
